snippet: Chandler Buckingham, a student at Rogers High School in Rogers, Ark., is one of eight high school seniors around the world who are blogging about their college searches.
abstract: Chandler Buckingham, a student at Rogers High School in Rogers, Ark., is one of eight high school seniors around the world who are blogging about their college searches.

headline.main: A Nonconformist Sizes Up Her College Prospects
